title: Vaibhavalakshmi Emerald and Diamond Haaram with Pendant
materials: Base Metal is 22K Gold Plated. Embellished with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
and Freshwater Pearls. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Features a classic Haaram design, meticulously crafted with intricate filigree work and delicate paisley (mango) motifs. A central pendant with an Emerald-cut green CZ is linked with a smaller pendant. Dangles of petite freshwater pearls add a touch of grace. The setting style offers maximum brilliance and security for the stones.
colors: Predominantly Gold and White (Diamond-like) with striking Emerald green accents and the soft luster of pearls.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like muhurtham
and half-saree functions. Adds regal charm to any festive occasion. Also suitable for modern formal events.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The brilliance of the CZ stones, combined with the vibrancy of the Emerald green CZs and the gentle glow of the pearls, creates a captivating and luxurious look. The Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity and radiance, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
